availability.p: These master files are not intended for public distribution. Only derivative export files are licensed and released.

sourceDesc.p: The SBL Greek New Testament (SBLGNT v.1.2) is a critically edited edition of the Greek New Testament produced by the Society of Biblical Literature and Logos Bible Software, made available under a [CC-BY License] (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Available at https://github.com/LogosBible/SBLGNT.

Situations and moves were derived by Christopher D. Land using projection data in the original [OpenText annotation](https://github.com/OpenText-org/GNT_annotation_v1.0) together with the capitalization of the SBLGNT edition. Manual error correction was then carried out by Christopher D. Land and Doosuk Kim.

Stages were derived by Ryder A. Wishart by modifying the pericope headings of Robinson and Pierpont's Greek New Testament, which is in the public domain. Differences can be identified by comparing this data to the start and end tokens compiled by [James Tauber](https://github.com/jtauber/vocabulary-tools/blob/master/gnt_data/pericopes.txt).

Actions and grammatical values were generated by Christopher D. Land, derived in part from syntax markup from the Global Bible Initiative that has been made available at https://github.com/biblicalhumanities/greek-new-testament/tree/master/syntax-trees/sblgnt.

MorphGNT data by James K. Tauber, made available under a [CC-BY-SA License] (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/). Released as "MorphGNT: SBLGNT Edition. Version 6.12." Available at https://github.com/morphgnt/sblgnt.
